content: The Baltimore agenda is now posted at http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Agenda_201609_WGM, for those who are interested

Note that the agenda currently only shows FHIR-I sessions, tutorials and a few others. It will approximately triple in size about 1 week out from the WGM (as well as get all of the meeting room information filled in) once other work group agendas are stable.
Watching for the updates - this is my go to resource for WGM schedules these days..
The more complete Baltimore schedule likely won't be posted until during the connectathon - I like to catch all of the last minute agenda updates from the other WGs.
After FHIR Connect-a-ton Happy hour at 6 at Max's in Fell's Point? That is walkable from the Inner Harbor or you can take the water taxi.

Reminder: tonight at 20:00 (also known as 8pm) you can come have a beer and talk about the .NET and Java libraries, plans, features etcetera. We have limited space (up to 26 people) at the back of the Bistro 300.
